inputs:
Concept: Wicked witches. Question: Which of the following sentences best characterizes wicked witches?
 option: Wicked witches eat all the sugar.
 option: Wicked witches wear white gowns.
 option: Wicked witches are skateboarders with magical powers.
 option: Wicked witches poison princesses.
Answer:
multiple_choice_targets: Wicked witches poison princesses.
Wicked witches wear white gowns.
Wicked witches are skateboarders with magical powers.
Wicked witches eat all the sugar.

inputs:
The word 'parg' is an adjective for things that humans dislike. Question: Which of the following sentences best characterizes parg kittens?
 option: Parg kittens are normally adopted.
 option: Parg kittens dislike humans.
 option: Parg kittens are adorable little cats.
 option: Parg kittens are not cute.
Answer:
multiple_choice_targets: Parg kittens are not cute.
Parg kittens are adorable little cats.
Parg kittens dislike humans.
Parg kittens are normally adopted.
